author: Matt Wreden
title: Park Fire: 427,067 acres, 34% contained | News | actionnewsnow.com
text: The Park Fire in Northern California has burned 427,067 acres and is 34% contained. The Tehama County Sheriff’s Office announced that there will be a Town Hall Meeting on August 9 at 6:30 p.m. to discuss the Park Fire and recovery efforts. The meeting will be held at the Tehama County Board Chambers at 727 Oak Street in Red Bluff. There are no more evacuation orders or warnings in Butte County. If you are in Tehama, Shasta or Plumas County and want to see your zone, use this link . Evacuation Orders MIN-700, MIN-702, MIN-704, MIN-706, MIN-708, MIN-710, MLC-712, MLC-714, PCK-474-B, TEH-448-A, TEH-696-B, TEH-696-C, TEH-698, TEH-716, TEH-718, TEH-720-A, TEH-720-B, TEH-720-C, TEH-722, TEH-724, TEH-726, TEH-728 Evacuation Warnings - Tehama County, Shasta County and Plumas County DLS-446-A, DLS-446-B, DLS-446-C, DLS-466-A, DLS-466-B, DLS-466-C, DLS-466-D, MAN-422, MAN-428, MAN-5000-A, MAN-5000-B, MAN-5010, MAN-5020, MAN-5030, MAN-5040, MAN-5060, OLD-5090, PCK-468, PCK-472, PCK-474-A, PCK-476, PLU-001-A, PLU-001-B, PLU-002-A, PLU-040-A, PSR-478, PSR-480, PSR-482, SHI-5070-A, SHI-5070-B, SHI-5120-A, SHI-5120-B, SHI-5160-A, SHI-5160-B, SHI-5190-A, SHI-5240-B, SHI-5340-B, TEH-448-B, TEH-448-C, TEH-470, TEH-496-B, TEH-496-F, TEH-498-B, TEH-498-E, TEH-500, TEH-694-A, TEH-694-B, TEH-696-A, TEH-736, TEH-840-A, TEH-730 Road Closures Butte County - Hwy 32 at Humboldt Rd Tehama County - Highway 36 above the Sky Ranch will remain closed due to fire activity in the area - Lanes Valley Road is closed Shasta County - Hwy 89 through Lassen National Park is closed Evacuation Resource Centers St. Peter's Episcopal Church: 510 Jefferson St - Red Bluff Saturday: 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Sunday: 11 a.m. to 6 p.m. Red Bluff Community Center: 1500 S. Jackson St. - Red Bluff August 15, 16 and 17 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Butte County Local Assistance Center - 2156 Pillsbury Road Suite 100 - Chico Open up to 2 weeks 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Required Reading:
